Real Conversations

20 Jun 2007

Guy #1: I'd totally hit that.
Guy #2: Dude, I'd hit that so hard whoever could pull me out would become the King of England.

You couldn't make this stuff up.

Dan Walmsley
CTO, NationBuilder
